item.title: Zedd - The Middle
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play The Middle on the ukulele by Zedd, Marren Morris, Grey. The chords used are G C D Em Am.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Zedd - Happy Now - Key of F
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of F, lowered from the original key of A. While the chords change fast, this is the easiest key to play the song on GCEA tuned ukulele.
As performed by Zedd, featuring Elley Duhé.
Many thanks to Katie Wardrobe from Midnight Music, www.midnightmusic.com.au, for the song suggestion.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Zedd - Happy Now - Baritone Ukulele
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of G, lowered from the original key of A.
As performed by Zedd, featuring Elley Duhé.
Many thanks to Katie Wardrobe from Midnight Music, www.midnightmusic.com.au, for the song suggestion.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Baritone Ukulele, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Zedd - Happy Now - Key of Bb
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of B-flat, raised from the original key of A. Great for practicing the half-barre B-flat Chord.
As performed by Zedd, featuring Elley Duhé.
Many thanks to Katie Wardrobe from Midnight Music, www.midnightmusic.com.au, for the song suggestion.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.
